authors.description: The slack-searchable name of the author of the icon

date_added.description: The date the icon was added to the repository

date_modified.description: The date the icon was last modified

description.description: A short description of the icon, and its purpose

exclusive_use.description: Whether the icon is for exclusive use in certain parts of the admin(e.g.: fraud)

keywords.description: Any words that could be associated with the icon, to help with search

public.description: Whether this icon is for public use by partners, or for internal Shopify use

set.description: Which set this icon belongs to (major, minor, spot)
